title: Terms of Service | Limitless Taps
description: Read the Limitless Taps Terms of Service outlining the agreement between us and our clients for software development services.

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully. They define the agreement regarding our web and mobile application development services.

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.description: If you have questions about these terms or our contracts, our team is here to help.

footer.agreement: By engaging our services, you agree to these terms.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Limitless Taps. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern the use of our website and the provision of our software development services, including web and mobile application development. By accessing our website or engaging our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

accounts.title: Services Scope
accounts.content: Limitless Taps specializes in providing custom software solutions, including but not limited to web design, web development, and mobile application development. The specific scope of work, deliverables, and timelines for any project will be defined in a separate proposal or statement of work agreed upon by both parties.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: Upon full payment of all fees, Limitless Taps grants the Client ownership of the custom code and deliverables created specifically for them. Limitless Taps retains ownership of its background technology, pre-existing code, and general know-how used in the project, granting the Client a non-exclusive license to use such background technology as part of the deliverables.

termination.title: Termination of Services
termination.content: Either party may terminate a service agreement as specified in the project contract. Limitless Taps reserves the right to suspend services or withhold deliverables in the event of non-payment or breach of these Terms. Upon termination, the Client shall pay for all work completed up to the termination date.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Limitless Taps operates. Any disputes arising from these Terms or our services shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.
